select M.*,N.mn,N.site_name,N.site_type,N.site_level,N.location,N.imorex,N.direction,data_status, device_status,online_status from ( select company_id,company_name,short_name,longitude,dimension,administrative_region,address,industry,env_protect_contact, contact_phone from company_base A inner join company_baseinfo B on A.id = B.company_id AND B.status ='2' where A.id in
#{id} ) M INNER JOIN site_monitor_point N ON M.company_id = N.company_id ORDER BY company_id

select *,B.device_state from sys_pollution_code A inner join( select pollution_code,device_state from site_monitor_device where monitor_id in ( select id from site_monitor_point where mn =#{mn})) B on A.code = B.pollution_code
select C.data_time,${field} from ${tableName} A inner join (select max(DATA_TIME) DATA_TIME,mn from ${tableName} where mn = #{mn} group by mn) C ON A.MN = C.MN and A.DATA_TIME = C.DATA_TIME
